kiAutoAgent.anthropic.apiKey.markdownDescription:
üîë **Anthropic API Key** for Claude models (Opus, Sonnet)
- Get your key at [console.anthropic.com](https://console.anthropic.com)

kiAutoAgent.openai.apiKey.markdownDescription:
üîë **OpenAI API Key** for GPT models (GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini)
- Get your key at [platform.openai.com](https://platform.openai.com)

kiAutoAgent.perplexity.apiKey.markdownDescription:
üîë **Perplexity API Key** for web research (optional)
- Get your key at [perplexity.ai](https://perplexity.ai)

kiAutoAgent.claude.serviceMode.markdownDescription:
ü§ñ **Claude Service Mode**
- `claude-code`: Local CLI (install with `npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code`)
- `api`: Direct API access with Anthropic key
- `web`: Browser proxy (deprecated)
enumDescriptions: Claude Code CLI - Recommended for best performance
API Mode - Direct Anthropic API access

kiAutoAgent.defaultModel.markdownDescription:
üéØ **Default AI Model**
- Opus 4.1: Supreme reasoning & conflict resolution
- Sonnet 4: Best for coding & implementation
- GPT-4o: Architecture & system design
- GPT-4o Mini: Fast & cost-effective

kiAutoAgent.maxTokens.markdownDescription:
üìù **Max Tokens Per Request**
Higher = longer responses but more cost

Automatically identifies Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, etc.

kiAutoAgent.workspaceContext.markdownDescription:
üìÅ **Workspace Context Level**
- `minimal`: Only current file
- `standard`: Related files
- `full`: Entire workspace structure

kiAutoAgent.ignorePatterns.markdownDescription:
üö´ **Ignore Patterns**
Files/folders to exclude from analysis

kiAutoAgent.streamResponses.markdownDescription:

kiAutoAgent.autoSaveChat.markdownDescription:

kiAutoAgent.multiAgentMode.markdownDescription:

Allow multiple agents to work together

kiAutoAgent.conflictResolution.markdownDescription:
‚öñÔ∏è **Conflict Resolution Strategy**
How to handle conflicting agent responses
enumDescriptions: Majority Vote - Most common answer wins
First Response - Use first valid response

kiAutoAgent.webSearch.enabled.markdownDescription:
üîç **Enable Web Search**
Allow agents to search the internet

kiAutoAgent.cacheResponses.markdownDescription:

kiAutoAgent.historyLimit.markdownDescription:

kiAutoAgent.rateLimitDelay.markdownDescription:
‚è∏Ô∏è **Rate Limit Delay (ms)**

kiAutoAgent.redactSecrets.markdownDescription:
üõ°Ô∏è **Redact Secrets**
Automatically hide API keys and passwords in outputs

kiAutoAgent.sandboxMode.markdownDescription:
üîí **Sandbox Mode**

kiAutoAgent.confirmDestructive.markdownDescription:

Require confirmation for delete/overwrite operations

kiAutoAgent.testCommand.markdownDescription:
üß™ **Enable Test Command**
Show 'Test Claude CLI' command in palette

kiAutoAgent.verboseErrors.markdownDescription:
üêõ **Verbose Error Messages**
Show detailed error information for debugging

kiAutoAgent.learning.enabled.markdownDescription:

Agents adapt based on successful interactions

kiAutoAgent.learning.adaptationThreshold.markdownDescription:

Success rate needed before adapting (0.8 = 80%)

kiAutoAgent.chat.fallbackMode.markdownDescription:

kiAutoAgent.agents.configuration.markdownDescription:
ü§ñ **Agent Configuration Overview**

üìö Each agent has specialized instructions and models:

**üé≠ Workflow Coordination**
‚Ä¢ `OrchestratorAgent` ‚Üí [orchestrator.md](file://./instructionsets/orchestrator.md)
‚Ä¢ Model: GPT-4o
‚Ä¢ Handles: Multi-agent workflows, task routing

**‚öñÔ∏è Conflict Resolution**
‚Ä¢ `OpusArbitratorAgent` ‚Üí [richter.md](file://./instructionsets/richter.md)
‚Ä¢ Model: Claude Opus 4.1
‚Ä¢ Handles: Agent conflicts, final decisions

**üèóÔ∏è Architecture & Design**
‚Ä¢ `ArchitectAgent` ‚Üí [architect.md](file://./instructionsets/architect.md)
‚Ä¢ Model: GPT-4o
‚Ä¢ Handles: System design, patterns, scalability

**üíª Code Implementation**
‚Ä¢ `CodeSmithAgent` ‚Üí [codesmith.md](file://./instructionsets/codesmith.md)
‚Ä¢ Model: Claude Sonnet 4
‚Ä¢ Handles: Coding, testing, optimization

**üìà Trading Strategies**
‚Ä¢ `TradeStratAgent` ‚Üí [tradestrat.md](file://./instructionsets/tradestrat.md)
‚Ä¢ Model: Claude Sonnet 4
‚Ä¢ Handles: Trading algorithms, backtesting

**üîç Web Research**
‚Ä¢ `ResearchAgent` ‚Üí [research.md](file://./instructionsets/research.md)
‚Ä¢ Model: Perplexity Sonar
‚Ä¢ Handles: Web search, documentation

kiAutoAgent.agents.instructionSetsPath.markdownDescription:
üìÅ **Instruction Sets Directory**
Path to agent instruction files

kiAutoAgent.agents.showInstructions.markdownDescription:
üìñ **Show Agent Instructions**
Display which instruction set each agent uses

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.mode.markdownDescription:
üéØ **Intent Detection Mode**
‚Ä¢ **strict**: Favors classifying as tasks (less queries)
‚Ä¢ **balanced**: Standard detection logic
‚Ä¢ **relaxed**: Favors classifying as queries (less tasks)

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.queryKeyword.markdownDescription:
‚ùì **Query Keywords**
Keywords that indicate the request is likely a question/query

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.taskKeywords.markdownDescription:
‚ö° **Task Keywords**
Keywords that indicate the request is likely an action/task

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.preferTaskEx.markdownDescription:
üöÄ **Prefer Task Execution**
When uncertain, prefer executing as task rather than answering as query

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.confidenceTh.markdownDescription:
üìä **Confidence Threshold**
Minimum confidence level (0.0-1.0) for intent classification

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.useAIClassif.markdownDescription:
ü§ñ **Use AI Classification**
Enhance keyword-based detection with AI when confidence is low

kiAutoAgent.intentDetection.debugLogging.markdownDescription:
üêõ **Debug Logging**
Show intent detection details in console

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.enab.markdownDescription:
üß† **Enable AI Intent Classification**
Use advanced AI-based intent classification instead of keywords

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.prov.markdownDescription:
ü§ñ **AI Provider**
Which AI model to use for intent classification
‚Ä¢ **auto**: Automatically select best available
‚Ä¢ **gpt-4**: Use OpenAI GPT-4
‚Ä¢ **claude**: Use Anthropic Claude

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.conf.markdownDescription:
üìä **AI Confidence Threshold**
Minimum confidence (0.3-0.95) for automatic execution
‚Ä¢ <0.6: Always ask for clarification
‚Ä¢ 0.6-0.8: May ask for confirmation
‚Ä¢ >0.8: Execute without confirmation

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.requ.markdownDescription:
‚úÖ **Require Explicit Confirmation**
Always ask for confirmation even with high confidence

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.lear.markdownDescription:
üìö **Learn from Corrections**
Improve classification accuracy by learning from user corrections

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.mult.markdownDescription:
ü§ù **Multi-Model Consensus**
Use multiple AI models for critical decisions (slower but more accurate)

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.dete.markdownDescription:
üòè **Detect Sarcasm**
Detect and handle sarcastic responses appropriately

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.open.markdownDescription:
üîë **OpenAI API Key for Classification**
Optional dedicated key for intent classification (uses main key if not set)

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.anth.markdownDescription:
üîë **Anthropic API Key for Classification**
Optional dedicated key for intent classification (uses main key if not set)

kiAutoAgent.ai.intentClassification.cach.markdownDescription:
‚è±Ô∏è **Cache Duration (seconds)**
How long to cache classification results (0 to disable)

kiAutoAgent.history.maxConversations.markdownDescription:
üìö **Max Conversations**
Maximum number of conversations to keep in history

kiAutoAgent.history.maxMessagesPerConver.markdownDescription:
üí¨ **Max Messages Per Conversation**
Maximum messages to keep per conversation

kiAutoAgent.ui.compactMode.markdownDescription:
üì¶ **Compact Mode**
Start chat in compact message view

kiAutoAgent.validationWorkflow.enabled.markdownDescription:
üîç **Enable Validation Workflow**
Automatically validate implementations with ReviewerGPT after each task

kiAutoAgent.validationWorkflow.maxIterat.markdownDescription:
üîÑ **Max Validation Iterations**
Maximum number of validation/fix cycles to perform

kiAutoAgent.validationWorkflow.agents.markdownDescription:
üë• **Validation Agents**
Agents to use in the validation workflow

kiAutoAgent.validationWorkflow.autoFix.markdownDescription:
üîß **Auto-Fix Issues**
Automatically attempt to fix issues found during validation with FixerBot

scripts.build: npm run version:patch && npm run compile

2.1.2.description: Fix OpusArbitrator visibility and extension output display

2.1.3.description: Fix Command Palette visibility for KI AutoAgent Chat commands

2.2.2.description: Added extensive debugging code to troubleshoot agent response issues

2.2.3.description: Fixed workflow to use only existing agents - mapped missing reviewer/fixer/docu agents to codesmith

2.3.0.description: MAJOR: Enhanced Agent Configuration System - Per-agent model selection, file-based instructions, self-adapting agents, auto-learning capabilities

2.3.1.description: HOTFIX: Fixed agent registration issues and double chat entries - agents now respond correctly

2.3.2.description: DEBUG: Added extensive debug logging system to identify agent registration and chat mode issues
